entry.title: 4/5 - Open Call for Artists
entry.content:

====== DESCRIPTION ======

New gallery located in Chelsea is looking for artists to showcase work in Grand Opening reception. All mediums welcome. Looking for NYC based artists. This is an open call for all visual artists. There is no fee.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

To be considered please submit up to five images and links to social media and/or website.
Deadline to apply is April 5th
Exhibition calendar:
April 5- Final Entry Deadline
Apri 10/11- All artist notifications sent
April 27 - Artwork received / delivered in person 11-8 p.m.
May 2 - Opening night reception
